channel.title: Bob Hicok on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: art on a shovel: looking forward to February
item.description: February is thirteen months long in Michigan. - A Primer, Bob Hicok, The New Yorker Looking forward to February, a civic project: a Marcel Duchamp readymade project, a retrospective civic installation of his work Prelude to a Broken Arm (1915). See Shearer, 1997 for more. The installation would provide a convenient hook for each of these readymade pieces. Care must be taken to ensure that the works of art be completely decorative and not functional.
